anya-e0806n3:2_1: yathāvuttaṁ syādisamudāyarūpaṁ, avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho, samudāye pavattā
anya-e0806n3:2_2: saddā avayavesupi vattantīti syādisaddo siādike avayavepi vattate, vidhiggahaṇañāyenāti
anya-e0806n3:2_3: “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā sa vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti ñāyena. Syādi ante
anya-e0806n3:2_4: yassa taṁ syādyantaṁ. Nanu ca “syādisyādinekattha”nti sāmaññena vuccamāne yaṁkiñci
anya-e0806n3:2_5: syādyantaṁ yenakenaci syādyantena sahekatthībhāvamarahati, tathāhi yathā gāmagatotiādo,
anya-e0806n3:2_6: tathā passa devadatte gāmaṁ, gato yaññadatto gurukulanti ādopi samāso tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘sāmaññena
anya-e0806n3:2_7: vuttepi’ccādi, yassa syādyantassayena syādyantena sambandho, tena syādyantena sahataṁ
anya-e0806n3:5_0: Ayamettha attho “yato gāmamiccetaṁ sādhanaṁ sādhyaṁ kiriyaṁ taṁbyapadesajānanayogyamapekkhate
anya-e0806n3:5_1: gatoti, ato sādhanaṁ kāra kaṁ sādhye kiriyāya niyataṁ, yato ca kiriyā sayaṁ sādhanamapekkhate
anya-e0806n3:5_2: kiṁ gatoti, ato kiriyāpi niyataṁ sādhanametissāti niyatasādhanā hoti ayaṁ yathāvutto
anya-e0806n3:5_3: niyamo aññamaññāpekkhāvasena vattamāno etesaṁ sādhyasādhanānaṁ sannidhāna mattena
anya-e0806n3:5_4: aññamaññato pakāsatī”ti. Passa devadatta gāmaṁ, gato yaññadatto gurukulaṁtyatra tu
anya-e0806n3:5_5: gāmanti sādhanaṁ passeti sādhyamapekkhate, gatoti gamanakiriyā tu gurukulamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n3:5_6: tato ca gāmagatānaṁ vākyantarāvayavānaṁ natthevāpekkhāti na bhavati samāso, sabbatthevamūhanīyaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:5_7: sambandho hi aññamaññāpekkhālakkhaṇo sambandhyantarato-navaṭṭhitaṁ nivattetvā visese
anya-e0806n3:8_0: Bhede visese gāmantetaṁ sāmaññaṁ visesāpekkhaṁ ‘gāmamāsīsati, jahāti, gato’ti, tathā
anya-e0806n3:8_1: ‘gato gāmaṁ, vanaṁ, gurukula’nti vevamākaṅkhato-bhilasato tassa tu padhānapadassupasajjanapadassa
anya-e0806n3:8_2: ca yā pariplavamānatā anavaṭṭhitatā taṁ visese visiṭṭhe sambandhini nivesento patiṭṭhapento
anya-e0806n3:8_4: kvaci sassāmi sambandharūpo avachindati sambandhyantarato nivattetīti attho, yato-yamapekkhā
anya-e0806n3:8_5: vākyakāleyeva nirūpyate, tato yatthātthi padānamapekkhā, tattha samāsāvagamo, yatra
anya-e0806n3:8_6: tu natthi, tatra na bhavatītyanupadiṭṭho visayavibhāgo ñāyateti bhāvo, bāle abudhetu
anya-e0806n3:8_8: sambhavati, paramatthato tu saddantarattā accantaṁ aññattaṁ vākyasamāsānaṁ bhedo,
anya-e0806n3:8_9: na hi vākye diṭṭhapadāni samāse santi, tathā ca vuttaṁ–
anya-e0806n3:10: Bhedo vākyasamāsānaṁ, ccantaṁ ññattaṁ (potthake) saddantaraṁ yatoti.
anya-e0806n3:11_0: Atoyevāti yato sāmaññena vuttepiyassayena sambandhotena saha tadekatthambhavatīti
anya-e0806n3:11_1: sambandhato viññāyatīti nāniṭṭhaṁ kiñcipīha hoti, atoyeva hetutoti attho. Byapekkhā
anya-e0806n3:11_2: sāmatthiyapariggahāyeti padānamaññoññākaṅkhā byapekkhā, sāva sā matthiyaṁ, tassa
anya-e0806n3:11_3: pariggahāya. Samatthavacanaṁ na katanti pāṇiniyehi viya “samattho padavidhī”ti (pā,
anya-e0806n3:11_4: 2-1-1) samatthavacanaṁ na kataṁ. Samattho pada vidhīti paribhāsāyamayamattho “vidhīyate
anya-e0806n3:11_5: vidhīyatīti (potthake) vidhi, padānaṁ vidhi padavidhisamāsādi, yokocīha satthe padavidhi,so
anya-e0806n3:11_6: samattho viggaha vākyatthābhidhāne (satti) veditabbo”ti, tādisaparibhāsāya byāpārato
anya-e0806n3:11_7: tesaṁ ‘passa devadatta gāmaṁ, gato yaññadatto gurukulaṁ’ tyādo nāniṭṭhappatti, sāmatthiyañcettha
anya-e0806n3:11_9: vākye byapekkhāceti (potthake). Tattha paṭhamassa pariggahaṁ vacanamantarena paṭipādiya
anya-e0806n3:11_10: dutiyassa pariggahamidāni vacanena paṭipādayamāha- ‘ekatthī bhāvo’ccādi, ekatthībhāvo
anya-e0806n3:11_11: bhinnatthānaṁ sādhāraṇatthatāvasena pavattiviseso, vākye hi sādhāraṇatthatā natthi
anya-e0806n3:11_13: sādhāraṇatthatā bhavati, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “samāse visesanaṁ visessamanupavīsati ekībhavati
anya-e0806n3:11_14: visesanaṁ, vākye tu visesanaṁ visessato visuṁyevā vatiṭṭhate”ti. Dvandasamāsassa
anya-e0806n3:11_15: tu padānaṁ visesanavisessābhāvepi sakalapadatthappadhānattā ‘rañño go ca asso ca
anya-e0806n3:11_16: puriso cā’ti vākyato ‘rañño gavāssa purisā’ti samāsassa viseso ekatthī bhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n3:11_17: bhavatyeva, tathāhi tattha vākye bhinnatthanibandhana samuccayapaṭipādanāya casaddo
anya-e0806n3:11_18: payujjate, samāse tu nappayujjate, ekattha vacanenevāti “syādisyādinekattha” tyekatthavacaneneva,
anya-e0806n3:11_19: ekattībhāvoyeva bhavatīti seso, evakāro na vākye tathāhi dīpeti. Vākye kathanti āha- vākye’tiādi.
anya-e0806n3:12_0: Vākyeti viggahavākye, visesena gayhati ñāyatyaneneti vigga- ho, so ca taṁ vākyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:12_1: ceti viggahavākyaṁ, visesena vā gahaṇaṁ viggaho, tadatthaṁ vākyaṁ viggahavākyaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:12_2: tasmiṁ, kāyaṁ byāpekkhāti āha-‘bhedādilakkhaṇā’ti, ādisaddena saṁsagga bheda saṁsaggānañca gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:13_0: Tattha sāntarehi sāmyantarehi ca byāvutti chedo, saṁvisesa sāmivisesānaṁ sambandho
anya-e0806n3:13_1: saṁsaggo, tadāha- ‘tathāhi’ccādinā, bhedako byāvattako, atthagahitoti kāraṇavasena
anya-e0806n3:13_2: bhedavādinā gahito, yadeccādinā saṁsaggavādino-dhippāyamāha yadā tūbhayampiccādinā
anya-e0806n3:14_0: ‘Putha bhinno attho yesaṁ padānaṁ tāni puthagatthāni, vākye hi rañño puriso tettha
anya-e0806n3:14_1: rājasaddo rājatthameva vadati, purisasaddo purisatthameva, vuttiyantu rājapurisotettha
anya-e0806n3:14_2: rājasaddopi purisatthameva vadatīti dvinnamekatthībhāvo bhavati, aññoyevāvayavatthānvito
anya-e0806n3:14_3: samudāyattho pātubhavatīti tadapekkhāya cekatthībhāvo vuccate, jahamānasakatthavuttimabhyupagamma
anya-e0806n3:14_4: vuttaṁ- ‘visesanassa sakattha pariccāgene’ccādi, atoyeva paro codessati ‘nanu ce’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n3:14_5: Ekatthībhavanaṁ samasananti iminā ekatthanti samāsoti nātthantaranti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n3:15_0: Jahamānāni padāni sakatthaṁ yassaṁ (sā) tathā vuttā, nāccantāya jayātīti evammaññate
anya-e0806n3:15_2: tassopādānato, sabbathā ca sakatthapariccāge paropakārāsampādanato-nupādānameva payojanābhāvā
anya-e0806n3:15_3: tassa siyā”ti, thapati vaḍḍhatī. Atthanti rājasaddavāccaṁ. Accantapariccāgepi na
anya-e0806n3:15_4: doso… vākye diṭṭhassupasajjanassa vuttiyaṁ soyevāyantyanvayāvasāyato tadatthāva gatiyāti
anya-e0806n3:16_0: Soyevāyantyajjhavasāyo-nvayo, soyevāyaṁ rājasaddo yo vākyatāle diṭṭhoti vohārīnamekattāvasāyenāsatyapi
anya-e0806n3:18_0: Abyayanti yadaññesaṁ pasiddhanti liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā upasagganipātānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:18_1: parehi abyayasaññākaraṇato abyayanti paresaṁ pasiddhaṁ, tesantvayaṁ samāso abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā
anya-e0806n3:18_2: anabyayaṁ abyayambhavatīti abyayībhāvo pasiddho, asaṅkhyassa sutattā tasseva vibhatyatthādayo
anya-e0806n3:18_3: visayabhāvena visesanānīti viññāyantītyāha- ‘asaṅkhye’ccādi, iminā nemesamāsatthāti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n3:19_0: Tāvasaddassa kamavuttiyaṁ yo-ttho sampajjate tamāha- ‘vibhatya’ccādi, vibhatyatthe
anya-e0806n3:19_2: uvāharitvā, niccayamāsāna maviggaho, asakapadaviggaho vā yutto, aññathā aniccatāpattītyāha-
anya-e0806n3:20_0: Asakapadena anattaniyapadena aññapadena viggaho asakapadaviggaho, tena, ettha hi
anya-e0806n3:20_1: yathā kumbhassa samīpaṁtyaññapadavākye samīpa saddenupasaddavacanīyassa vuttattā
anya-e0806n3:20_2: upasaddo nappayujjate, yathā itthī sūti etthādhisaddavacanīyassā (dhā)ratthassa sattamiyā
anya-e0806n3:20_3: vuttattā nādhisaddoti ‘itthīsū’ti aññapadavākyaṁ vuttaṁ, kathāpavattāti tvādheyyo
anya-e0806n3:21: Adhisaddassa pana puratovaṭṭhitassādhāre vattamānassa taṁsamānādhikaraṇena sattamyantenitthisaddena saha samāsoti dassetumāha-‘adhisaddo’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:22_0: Syādilopoti adhisaddato itthisaddato ca paresaṁ sattamī bahuvacanānaṁ lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n3:22_1: Atta (bhāva) sampattīti sarīrasampatti adhippetāti brahmasaddassa sarīraṁ atthoti
anya-e0806n3:23: Samāsavibhattiyāti samāsato uppannavibhattiyā, sakalo padesasakalo, pariggahāpekkhāti abhyupagamāpekkhāyāti attho, abhyupagamepi hi pariggahasaddo–
anya-e0806n3:25: Ravimhi rāhugahite, dāresu ca pariggaho”ti nighaṇṭu.
anya-e0806n3:26_0: Sakalassa bhāvo sākalyaṁ-sakalasaddappavattinimittaṁ, tampana nissesa matanissesa
anya-e0806n3:26_1: (potthake) ggahaṇā puthu bhavatītyāha- ‘asesaggahaṇa’nti, tiṇānaṁ sākalyanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n3:26_2: tiṇasaddena hi tiṇasahitāni gahitāni, teneva vakkhati byatirekanaye- ‘taṁ sabbaṁ
anya-e0806n3:28: Tatoti yato sakalasakale na vattati, pariggahāpekkhāya samattiyā antato sakāsā sākalyaṁ na bhijjateti sambandho, samatthiyampi ante udāharaṇanti seso.
anya-e0806n3:29_0: Aggipariyantanti aggiattho gantho tādatthiyā aggi, sopariyanto-ssa ajjheyassāti aggipariyantaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:29_1: yattakassājjheyassa pariggaho, tassa aggi pariyanto, agginā pariyantabhūtena sahito
anya-e0806n3:30_1: ca mā siyāti, atoyeva coccate ‘athetaretarābhāve’iccādi, itarasmiṁ itarassa abhāvo
anya-e0806n3:30_2: itaretarābhāvo, go asso na bhavatīti hi atthantarattaṁ nisedhīyate, na vatthubhāvo,
anya-e0806n3:30_3: brāhmaṇo na bhavatītyatrapibrāhmaṇattadhammo nisedhīyate, na vatthubhāvo, parattātiādinā
anya-e0806n3:31: Atikkamābhāvetī ettha atikkamāti pañcamiyā asamāsaniddesoti āha- ‘atikkamā’ti, na panuppannassa pacchāti iminā atikkamābhāvo nāma uppannassa pacchā abhāvoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:32_1: idhādhippetaṁ kālaṁ dassetumāha- ‘upabhogasse”ccādi, upabhogo kammasādhano lahupāvuraṇassa
anya-e0806n3:32_2: nāyamupabhogakāloti viggaho, (ati) lahupāvuraṇanti rūpasiddhīti dassetuṁ lahupāvuraṇassātiādi vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:33_0: Yoggaṁ rūpanti viggahe anurūpaṁ, nanu cātra niccasamāsattāsapadaviggahena bhavitabbaṁtyāsaṅkiyāha-‘vicchāya’miccādi,
anya-e0806n3:33_1: anusaddena hi yoge vicchāyaṁ “anunā”ti (2-10) dutiyā vidhīyate, vākyeyevāssa ca payogo
anya-e0806n3:33_2: nāññatreti vākyampi bhavatīti maññate. Sakikhīti etthāpi “akāle sakatthe”ti (3-81) sahassa so.
anya-e0806n3:34_0: Sadiso kikhiyāti ettha kikhiyā pasiddhabhūtāya sādhiyassa sādhanabhāvena gahitāya
anya-e0806n3:34_1: sadhammattena koci sādhiyo sadisoti vuttoti kimidha sadiso appadhānaṁ padhānamevāti
anya-e0806n3:34_2: attho tathā sati puppapadatthappadhānenāsaṅkhyasamāsena sakikhīti ettha na bhavitabbanti
anya-e0806n3:34_3: āha-‘nanuce’tyādi, kikhiyāti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, ettha pana sadisattassa kikhīyā-ppaṭibaddhattāppadhānattaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:35_0: Yathā devadattoti ettha yadi samāso bhaveyya, devadattena sadiso yathādevadattanti
anya-e0806n3:35_1: bhaveyya, paṭisiddhattā pana (na) samāsoti, kikhīti makkaṭassābhidhānaṁ. Jeṭṭhānukkamenāti
anya-e0806n3:35_2: vuttattā anujeṭṭhanti tatiyantatā gamyate. Cakkena yugapadi sacakkaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:39_0: Pañcamyāti kasmā vuttaṁ nanu avuttepi tasmiṁ vakkhamānanayena pañcamyantattā pañcamyanteheva
anya-e0806n3:39_1: samāso viññāyatītyāsaṅkiyāha‘yadipi’ccādi. Tathāpiccādinā pariharati, hotu kāmaṁ
anya-e0806n3:39_2: ‘paripabbataṁ vijjotate’ti dutiyānisedhāya, aññatra kathanti āha ‘iha ce’tyādi.
anya-e0806n3:40_0: Ācattāro vāti āsaddo vākye, saraṇe vā, gāmo bahi tiṭṭhatītyattho, purato gāmampassāti
anya-e0806n3:40_1: vadanto puretyatthappaghānoyanniddeso, nasarūpappadhānoti dasseti, abhimukhe gāmampassātyattho.
anya-e0806n3:40_2: Avuttānametānyupalakkhaṇāni, tasmā ‘tiro gāmampassā’tipi vuttaṁ hoti, tiriyato gāmampassa,
anya-e0806n3:41: Apasaddayoge niccapañcantassa vikappena samāsavidhānāvābhavanenodāharaṇaṁ dinnaṁ (ettha) pañcamyāti payojanābhāvepi aññadatthaṁ kariyamānamihāpyatthavantaṁ hoti.
anya-e0806n3:43_0: “Anu yaṁ samayā”ti (2-1-15) ca “yassa cāyāmo”ti (2-1-16) ca pāṇinino vacanadvayaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:43_1: ayametesamattho “yassa samayā samīpavācī anusaddo, tena saha samassateti ca, anu
anya-e0806n3:43_2: yassāyāmavācī, tena syādyantena saha samassate”ti ca. Vatthuto tu sāmīpyāyāmavantānamaniddesepi
anya-e0806n3:44_0: Sambandhittāti sambandhisaddā sakatthamiva niyatapaṭiyoginamākkhapanti… tena vinā
anya-e0806n3:44_1: tesaṁ sakatthābhāvā. Āyāmo dīghatā, “yassa samīpāyāmesvanu”ti yathāvuttasuttadvayamākkhepenupadisati,
anya-e0806n3:44_3: samīpaggahaṇaṁ vikappatthaṁ, tena vanassānuti vākyenāpi bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:45_0: Gaṅgāya āyāmo anugaṅgaṁ, bhāgavuttikāro “lakkhaṇene”ti vattate. Yassāyāmavācī anu,
anya-e0806n3:45_1: tena lakkhaṇena samassate anugaṅgaṁ bārāṇasī, gaṅgāya lakkhaṇabhūtāya pasiddhāyāmaguṇāya
anya-e0806n3:45_2: bārāṇasī lakkhīyate yāvāyatāyāmā gaṅgā tāvāyampīti sabhāvato tūpamānopameyyabhāvo
anya-e0806n3:45_3: samāse patīyate gaṅgā viya dīghā”ti lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvaṁ vaṇṇeti. Evaṁ sati bārāṇasīti
anya-e0806n3:45_4: paṭhamā nopapajjateti maññamāno āha-‘gaṅgāyā mena yuttā “tyādi. Anugaṅgaṁ bārāṇasiyāti
anya-e0806n3:47_0: Akatasamāsācāti anena iminā katasamāsataṁ dīpeti, tiṭṭhantīti idaṁntappaccayantassātthapadanti
anya-e0806n3:47_2: pumbhāvābhāvo nīpātanā, akāro ca nipātanā “gotva catthe cā lope”tyatra (3-46) ‘nāññāsaṅkhyatthesū’tyanuvattanato.
anya-e0806n3:48_0: Lūnayavādīnamettha nipātanā kālepi napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ, saṁhaṭāyavā yasmiṁ kāle saṁhaṭayavaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:48_1: ummattagaṅganti saññāyamaññapadatthe vādhikārepi niccasamāso, na hi vākyaṁ saññāti,
anya-e0806n3:48_2: ādisaddena‘samassa sobhanattaṁ susama’miccādīnañca saṅgaho, pabhāvanaṁ pakāsanaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:50: Oraṁ gaṅgāya, pāraṁ yamunāyāti samāse kate nipātanā ekāro, teneva vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘ekārantattaṁ nipātanato’ti, vuttivikappanatthatoti vuttiyā vikappo attho yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:52_0: Socekatthībhāvo visiṭṭho-bhimatoti sambandho, muhuttanti accantasaṁyoge dutiyā, pādisamāsaṁ
anya-e0806n3:52_1: katvāti āsaddassa harasaddena vuttisaddena vuttipadena (pañcikā) kiriyākhyāpyateti
anya-e0806n3:52_2: asatyupasecanādikiriyāyaṁ saṅkhārakaṁ saṅkhāriyaṁ vā na bhavati, atthiceha tadubhayaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:52_3: tato tesaṁ sambhavāyeva samāsantobhūtakiriyā gamyateti maññate, tathāhi dadhibhojanaṁtyādo
anya-e0806n3:52_4: vutte adhyādino saṅkhārakattaṁ bhojanādino ca saṅkhāriyattaṁ patīyate, na copasekādimantarena
anya-e0806n3:53_1: atthe niccasamāso-bhimato sabbaliṅgatā ca, tathā vacanābhāvamiha manasikatvā ‘katha’miccādinā
anya-e0806n3:53_3: vidhānaṁ katanti evamaññateti sambandho, tattheccādinā añña padatthe bhavissatītyetthādhippāyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:54_1: siddhāyeva, kathañcipi catutthyantā bhinnatthassa samāse katepi tattha virodhamāha-
anya-e0806n3:55_1: pāṇinīyānaṁ ‘etassa ida’nti atthe samāse kate yo-ttho sampajjati, aññatthasamāsepi
anya-e0806n3:55_2: soyevatthoti dasseti ‘yo’ iccādinā, anupādāparinibbānanimittaṁ vāyāmoccādinā yojetabbaṁ…
anya-e0806n3:55_3: taṁnimittattā vāyāmādīnaṁ, tesaṁ kathādīnanti ettha tesaṁ vāyāmādīnanti vattabbaṁ…
anya-e0806n3:55_4: vāyāmotyādinā vuttattā so ca tannimittaṁ hoteva, ayametthādhippāyo “etassa idanti
anya-e0806n3:55_5: vākye atthena samāse sabbaliṅgatā ca ‘etadattho etadatthā etadattha’nti vāyāmādayo
anya-e0806n3:55_6: ca samāsatthā honti, etaṁ anupādāparinibbānamattho payojanametassa etissā etassāti
anya-e0806n3:56_0: Idañca “avippaṭisāratthāni kho ānandaṁ kusalāni, avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ
anya-e0806n3:56_1: anupādāparinibbānatthāya etadattho vāyāmo etadatthā kathā etadatthā mantanā etadatthaṁ
anya-e0806n3:57_1: tattheva bahulaggahaṇena ‘gāmaniggatā’dīsu samāso vutto, tenetthāntodāharaṇānaṁ dvinnamadhikattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:57_3: (2-2-11) sutte guṇa itivacanenābhimato, saditi saññā tesaṁ ntamānānaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:58: So kathanti iha ‘bhāvatittatthehī’ti bhāvappaccayanteneva samāsapaṭisedhavidhānā ‘brāhmaṇassa sukkā’ iccādo so samā sappaṭisedho kathaṁ sijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n3:59_0: Guṇattaniyevāti guṇasabhāve eva, abhimatoti vāttikakārassābhimato “tadavaṭṭhehi ca
anya-e0806n3:59_1: guṇehī”ti, tasaddenāssa guṇassa parāmāso tasmiṁyeva guṇe avatiṭṭhantīti tadavaṭṭhā,
anya-e0806n3:59_2: guṇeyeva guṇātiṭṭhanti na kadācipi soyamityabhedā dabbavuttayo sukkādayo viya te
anya-e0806n3:59_3: tadavaṭṭhā guṇā gandhādayo, tadavaṭṭhitehi guṇehi chaṭṭhī samassateti vattabbanti attho.
anya-e0806n3:60_0: Ābhimatoti “pūraṇā”disutte abyayaggahaṇena, devadattassāti chaṭṭhiyā gurumhi sāpekkhattepi
anya-e0806n3:60_1: gurusaddassa sambandhisaddattā sakatthe vākye viya vuttiyaṁ byapekkhā-yāhānito vuttisabbhāvaṁ
anya-e0806n3:61_0: Sātthevāti sakatthe viya, assāti sambandhisaddassa, sāmatthiyaṁ gamakattañcatthīti
anya-e0806n3:61_2: vā atthīti attho, guruno kulaṁ dāsassa bhariyāti viggaho, athātra brāhmaṇassa ucce’iccādo
anya-e0806n3:61_3: sāmatthiyaṁ gamakattaṁ vā natthīti kuto-vasitaṁ, yena tadābhāvātra samāsābhāvo vaṇṇīyateccāha-‘sāmatthyādinotvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:63: Yogīnanti itarītarayogīnaṁ, anenetaretarayogacatthasamāsaṁ vadati. Vuttihotītyassa vivaraṇaṁ chaṭṭhīsamāso bhavatīti, ekatthībhāveiccassa vivaraṇaṁ gavādīnañca catthasamāse satīti.
anya-e0806n3:64_0: Ruḷhittāti samāsasseva kīḷāvācakattena jīvikāya ca paccāya kattena pasiddhattā, na
anya-e0806n3:64_2: kiṁ vacaneneti maññate, sarasi ruḷhanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:65_0: Ayampana amādisamāso kammadhārayadigusamāsāti sabbepi paresaṁ tappurisasadisattā
anya-e0806n3:65_1: tappurisā, yathā hi tassa puriso tappurisoti uttarapadatthappadhāno, tathā te siyuṁ,
anya-e0806n3:65_2: saṅkhyāpubbatta napuṁsakattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatītidigu.
anya-e0806n3:67_0: Kintaṁ visesana micchāha-‘yami’ccādi, yaṁ avatthāpayati taṁ vuccatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:67_1: kintaṁ visessamiccāha-‘yadaneke’ccādi, yaṁ avatthā pīyate tamabhidhīyateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:67_2: nanvekatthenetyuccamāne visesseneti kathamavagamyate, yato evaṁ vivaritavā tyāsaṅkiyāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:68_1: tena vinā tesaṁ sakatthassāsambhavāti, vivaritavāti vivarittha, ekatthenetīmassa
anya-e0806n3:68_2: samānādhikaraṇena saha samāso hotīti evaṁ sājjhāhāro attho veditabbo, atthasaddassānekatthattā
anya-e0806n3:69_0: Visessassa samānādhikaraṇattañca visesanāpekkhanti sambandho. Visessasaddassa visesanena
anya-e0806n3:69_1: saha samānādhikaraṇattaṁ visesana saddāpekkhanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo, tattha
anya-e0806n3:69_2: kāraṇamāha- ‘sambandhā’ti, adhikaraṇassa samānattaṁ nāma bhinnānaṁ sambandhīnaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n3:69_3: sambandhino ca sambandhamantarena na hontī hoti (potthake) ti visesanavisessānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:69_4: sambandho viññāyate, evaṁ viññātā tasmā sambandhāti attho.
anya-e0806n3:70_0: Saddabyatirekena hettha atthānaṁ visesanavisessabhāvo na sambhavati, tathā hi ‘nīlamuppala’nti
anya-e0806n3:70_1: pañca vatthūni sannihitāni nīlanti nīlattaṁ guṇasāmaññaṁ, nīlo guṇo, tadādhāro dabbanti
anya-e0806n3:70_2: tīṇi, uppalanti uppalattaṁ uppalajāti, dabbañca tannissayoti dve.
anya-e0806n3:71_0: Tattha uppalajāti guṇajātīnaṁ nīlajātiuppalajābhadhanaṁ (kātantaṭīkā) tāva na sambhavati
anya-e0806n3:71_1: visesanavisessabhāvo jātiyā nigguṇattā, nīlattassa ca nīlaguṇe samavāyino, uppalattassa
anya-e0806n3:71_2: ca uppaladabbe samavāyino samānādhikaraṇattampi natthi, uppalajātiyā nīlassa ca guṇassa
anya-e0806n3:71_3: atthi samānādhikaraṇattaṁ… nīla muppalanti pavattinimittānaṁ uppalajātinīlaguṇānamekamadhi
anya-e0806n3:71_4: karaṇaṁnissayoti, visesana visessabhāvo tu natthi jātiyā anīlattā, guṇadabbānantu
anya-e0806n3:71_6: tatiyaṁ natthi, yena samānādhikaraṇattaṁ siyā, evaṁ nīladabba uppaladabbānampi aññamaññaparihārena
anya-e0806n3:71_7: vattumicchitānaṁ na visesana visessabhāvo, nāpi samānādhikaraṇattaṁ, kasmā aññamaññāsambandhato
anya-e0806n3:71_8: apekkhābhāvato, vuttapaṭipakkhato pana vakkhamānanayena saddānameva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:72_0: Atoyevāti yato visessassa samānādhikaraṇattaṁ visesanāpekkhaṁ, atoyeva hetutoti attho,
anya-e0806n3:72_1: bhinnanimittappa yuttānamevāti sāmaññena nīlaguṇādhāre dabbe guṇeyeva vā nīlasaddassa,
anya-e0806n3:72_2: uppalasaddassa ca sāmaññena guṇavati dabbe vattamānattā aññamaññesu bhinnesu saddappavattiyā
anya-e0806n3:73_0: Samānādhikaraṇattanti nīluppalasaddānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ yoge visiṭṭhadabba vācittassāsambhavā,
anya-e0806n3:73_1: nīlañca taṁ uppalaṁ ceti sāmānādhikaraṇye sannipatite sati sambhavā evaṁ tattha visiṭṭhe
anya-e0806n3:73_2: vatthumhi pavattānaṁ tesaṁ samānatthatā, evakārena byavacchinnamatthaṁ dassetumāha-‘natvabhinne’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:74: Nanucetyādi codyaṁ, sīsampātīti sīsapā rukkhaviseso, nayida mevamiccādi parihāro.
anya-e0806n3:75_0: Atha tuccateiccādinā parassa vacanāvakāsamāsaṅkate, visesavuttīti phalassa rukkhassa
anya-e0806n3:75_1: ca sāmaññasaddattā bhāvena visese vutti, imesanti sīsapādīnaṁ na samodhāritāti na
anya-e0806n3:75_2: nicchitā, sāmaññavuttiyeva samodhāritāti adhippāyo, avasitā nicchitā vutti yesaṁ
anya-e0806n3:75_3: sīsapādīnaṁ te avasitavuttayo, payatanaṁ vinā tadā pappoti cāti sambandho, payatananti
anya-e0806n3:75_5: vuttatthānampi sarūpamattakathanāya ‘pūpe bahū ānaye’ti yathā, evaṁ jātīyakanti sarūpakathanappakārayuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:75_6: Upasaṁharamāha-‘tadeva’miccādi, nipātasamudāyovāyaṁ vuttena pakārenetyassa atthe vattate.
anya-e0806n3:76_1: visesanassa visessassa vā sambhavepi, yatrapyubhinnamatthi visesanavisessabhāvasambhavo
anya-e0806n3:76_2: tatthapitāva bahulaṁvacanatova nivatti hoti, kimpanā-ññatarasambhaveti dassetumāha-‘yathā
anya-e0806n3:76_3: puṇṇo’iccādi, ettha pana aññepi puṇṇanāmakā santīti byabhicārasambhavā ubhinnampi
anya-e0806n3:76_4: visesanavisessabhāvasambhave bahulaṁvacanameva samāsaṁ nivatteti, evaṁ vidhepīti
anya-e0806n3:76_5: aññatarasambhavepi, na kevalaṁ visesanavisessabhāvasambhave, atha kho evaṁ vidhepyañña
anya-e0806n3:77_0: Yajjevamiccādi paccekaṁ visesanavisessabhāve sati aniṭṭhā pādanacodanā, paccekaṁ
anya-e0806n3:77_1: visesanaṁ siyā ubhinnampi visesanattā, tattha dosamāha-‘visessassaca pubbanipāto’ti,
anya-e0806n3:77_2: co-vadhāraṇe, vattabbantarasamuccaye vā, kutoccāha- ‘nāggahite’ccādi, iti kāraṇe,
anya-e0806n3:77_3: ato kimaniṭṭhamāyāta miccāha- ‘uppalanīlantipi siyā’ti, itthañcarahi kintyāha- ‘nīluppalanti
anya-e0806n3:78_1: attho, atha dvinnampi appadhānattaṁ kasmā na siyā tyāha- ‘appadhānattepi’ccādi, sakasakappadhānāpekkhāvantānanti
anya-e0806n3:78_2: sakesake padhāne attani apekkhāvantānaṁ. Atha kuto dabbasseva padhānattamasitaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:78_3: na tu guṇassetyāsaṅkiya ñāyamupanissayati ‘atha ce’tyādinā. Chāgotyajo vuccate, taṁ
anya-e0806n3:78_4: setavaṇṇamālabhetha māreyya, phusanaṁ vā kareyyāti attho, āpubbo labhi hi māraṇe
anya-e0806n3:78_5: phusane ca vattate, desanāyanti codanāyanti codanāvākya (potthake) vedavākyeti attho,
anya-e0806n3:79: Chāgābhāveti setaguṇayuttassa chāgassābhāve, piṭṭhapiṇḍimālabbhāti setaguṇayogena viṭṭhapiṇḍiṁ ālambha, na ca nālambhate tasmā guṇo appadhānanti ajjhāharitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:80_0: Puna codento āha- ‘nanu ce’ccādi, athetyadhippāyamāsaṅkate, aniṭṭhamāpādayati nīlasaddepi
anya-e0806n3:80_1: pasaṅgo’ti, kutoccāha- ‘sopihi’ccādi, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti- “uppalasaddo jātivācī, na
anya-e0806n3:80_2: tu dabbavācī, jāti visiṭṭhadabbavācittā yadi dabbavācīti vuccate, tadā nīlasaddopi
anya-e0806n3:80_3: guṇavisiṭṭha dabbavācittā dabbavacanamāpajjatīti imesaṁ na koci viseso”ti, pariharanto
anya-e0806n3:80_4: āha ‘nedamatthi’ccādi, apāyino apagantāro dabbāti gamyate, kutoccāha- ‘satīpi’ccādi, iti kāraṇe.
anya-e0806n3:81_0: Visesanamekattheneti siddhepi papañcatthaṁ paripphuṭatthañca udāharaṇabahuttaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0806n3:81_1: pāṇiniyehi bahuṁ suttitaṁ, sabbassetassa paccakkhātabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ vuttiyamudāharaṇamattaṁ
anya-e0806n3:81_2: dassitaṁ, tadidāni byākhyātukāmo āha- ‘pubbakāle’ccādi, chinnoca visesanantī sambandho
anya-e0806n3:81_4: suttaṁ, tatthekādīnaṁ vuttiyamudāharaṇāni na dassitānyupalakkhaṇatova viññāyantīti
anya-e0806n3:81_5: dassetumāha- ‘eke’ccādi, eko ca so purisocātyādinā viggaho upalakkhaṇattāyeva ca
anya-e0806n3:81_6: ‘satta ca te isayo ca sattisayo’ccādikañca daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:82_1: sādhāraṇo yo dhammo sāmatātena visiṭṭhaṁ yadupameyyaṁ, taṁ vacanenetyattho upamānopameyyaccādi
anya-e0806n3:82_2: kassa, samāso bhavatīti seso, kāraṇamāha- ‘visese’ccādi, visesāpariggahāti visesanantyeva
anya-e0806n3:82_3: sāmaññena pariggahā, evambhū tassāpīti upamānarūpassāpi. Nanu satthīsaddassasatthiyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:82_4: vutti sāmāsaddassa tu devadattāya, ato byadhikaraṇattā kathamettha samāsoccāsaṅkīyāha-
anya-e0806n3:82_5: ‘yade’ccādi, samāno dhammo sāmattādi yassa so sadhammo, tassa bhāvo sādhammiyaṁ sāmattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:82_6: tasmā devadattātthe vattate upacāravasena, sāmāsaddopi guṇavacanopi sāmattaṁ vatvā
anya-e0806n3:82_7: saddhādittavasenābhedopacārena vā devadattāyaṁ vattate, nanu ca sāmāsaddassa devadattābhidhāne
anya-e0806n3:83_0: Ihāti niddhāraṇe, etesaṁ guṇānaṁ majjheti attho, iha vā satthiyaṁ, sāmaguṇavantatāya
anya-e0806n3:83_1: sāmāyāti gamyate, pasiddhivasenāti satthisāmātyatropamānaṁ satthī, upameyyā devadattā,
anya-e0806n3:83_2: pasiddhantupamānaṁ bhavati nāppasiddhaṁ… pasiddhasādhammiyā sādhyu sādhanamupamānanti
anya-e0806n3:83_3: katvā satthiyeva sāmaṅguṇena pasiddhā na devadattā, tasmā sāmaguṇappasiddhiyāti attho.
anya-e0806n3:83_4: Sādhyute upamīyateneneti sādhanamupamānaṁ, sādhyate upadhīyateti sādhyamupameyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:83_5: pasiddhassa sādhammiyaṁ tena, sādhyassāppasiddhassa kassaci sādhanaṁ sādhyasādhanaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:83_6: Yatratviccādinā bahulaṁvacanasāmatthiyā sāmaññavacaneneva samāsasabbhāvaṁ vatvā aññenāsabbhāvamudāharaṇena
anya-e0806n3:84: Taṇḍulasaddoti upameyyabhūtataṇḍulasaddo, taṇḍulattampi vatvā dabbe pavatto sāmaññavacano natu bhavatīti sambandho, dabbeti taṇḍuladabbe phāladabbe ca.
anya-e0806n3:85_1: yo visāradattādidhammo tabbacanassa ‘muni ayaṁ sīho viya visārado’tyādo visāradādisaddassāppayogeti
anya-e0806n3:85_2: attho, kesañciti kesañci saddānaṁ majjhe, visessattameva phuṭayati. ‘Tathā ce’tyādinā,
anya-e0806n3:85_3: visesanavisessānaṁ yathiṭṭhattā niccaṁ sīhādīnaṁ visessatāyeva vacanicchāti pubbanipātattāppasaṅgoti
anya-e0806n3:85_4: bhāvo, upapatyantaramāha-‘visesanasseve’ccādi, yadipi sīho visesanameva na visessaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:86_0: Athātrāpi visesananteva samāsappaṭipādane’muni ayaṁ sīhova visārado’ccādo sāmatthiyatova
anya-e0806n3:86_3: sāmaññavacanappayoge sāpekkhattā samāsāppasaṅgoti sāmatthiyaṁ tasmāti attho. Sāmaññappayogatthanti
anya-e0806n3:86_4: samāsavākye sāmaññavacanassa sūrattādi(no), appayogatthaṁ, tathā hiccādinā sāmaññasaddappayoge
anya-e0806n3:87_0: Visesānantabbhāvāti sāmaññassa samāse antobhāvepi tikhīṇattādito visiṭṭhassa sūrassādivacanīyassa
anya-e0806n3:87_1: visesassa samāse anantogadhattā appasaṅgo sāpekkhamasamatthanti. Atheti ‘saccameta’ntiādiṁ
anya-e0806n3:87_2: paravacanamāsaṅkiya vadati, evamādisijjhanatthaṁ samāsoti (ñāpanatthaṁ) ārabbhanīyambhavatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:88_1: visesanaṁ tenevā (potthake) ppadhānaṁ, samāsāvayavabhūtaṁ rājānaṁ pati visessabhāvenāviphalitasakatthatāya
anya-e0806n3:88_2: padhānabhūtassa purisassa. Ādisaddena ‘rājapurisassa dassanīyassa geha’nti saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0806n3:89_0: Ettha hi gehampati visesanabhāvenāppadhānattepi rājānampati padhānabhūtassa purisassa
anya-e0806n3:89_1: sāpekkhassāpi samāso hoteva. Idañcañāpanatthaṁ vacanārambhappayojanañca, kāraṇamāha- ‘gamakattā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n3:90_0: Gamakattāti viggahavākyatthassa vuttiyampatīyamānattā gamakattaṁ tasmā, naceha gamakattamatthīti
anya-e0806n3:90_1: ‘muni sīhova sūro’tyatra tu vākyato yottho patīyate, nāyaṁ ‘muni sīho sūro’tyato
anya-e0806n3:90_2: gamyateti gamakattaṁ natthī-ti attho, tathāhi munisīhasaddenevo pamānopameyyabhāvanimittassa
anya-e0806n3:91_1: bahulādhikārato viññāyati, nanu cātra visessabhāvāsambhavāppasaṅgoyeva vuttiyāti
anya-e0806n3:92_1: hi visessambhavati yathā nīlatāyuppalaṁ, pariharati ‘nedamatti’ccādinā, mantāṇiputtānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:92_2: anekattāti kevalaṁ mantāṇiyā putto puṇṇoyevāti abhāvā tesaṁ bahubhāvato, attano attano
anya-e0806n3:93: Vuttiyeveti evakārena byavacchinnamatthamāha-‘vākyaṁ nivattetī’ti. Visiṭṭhajātivacanāti vuttaṁ kaṇhasappajātiyā lohitasālijātiyā ca visiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n3:94_1: bālayuvattādisaṅkhātatacchakabhāvato abyāvutto, atthināmadheyyoti tacchako nāma koci
anya-e0806n3:94_2: tannāmo atthi, kiriyāsaddoti tacchatīti tacchakoti evaṁ kiriyāya pavattinimittattenopādinno
anya-e0806n3:94_4: samāsena bhavitabbaṁ, tathā sati kimidaṁ paccudāharaṇaṁ kata”nti. Atra kenaci na
anya-e0806n3:94_5: nāmadheyyassetyādi nopajāyatevātyetadavasānaṁ vuccamānamanudyataṁ nirākattukāmo āha-‘yopā he’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:95: Imassāyamadhippāyo “vuttanayena tacchakasaddassa kiriyā saddassātthavisayāpekkhāyābhāvato visessattābhāvā paccudāharaṇamidaṁ kata”nti.
anya-e0806n3:96_0: Kasmā ayuttamiccāha-‘yato’ccādi, nāmadheyyassa kiriyāvācino ca atthābhidhānasāmatthiyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:96_1: tulyaṁ vā na vā, avayavappasiddhiyā samudāyappasiddhi balavati vā navetyetaṁ vicāretuṁ
anya-e0806n3:97_1: na yujjate ‘sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanaṁ sātthakaṁ hotī’ti visesanaṁ maggīyate,
anya-e0806n3:97_2: nāsambhave nābyabhicāre yathā sītaṁ (himaṁ) uṇhoggīti, tasmā sambhavabyabhicāracintā
anya-e0806n3:97_4: vicāretumadhikatanti katthacipi visesanavisessa sabbhāve samāso hotevā”ti, yadipi
anya-e0806n3:97_6: tathāpi vakkhamānanayena samāsasabbhāvā na kāci hānīti dassetumāha- ‘ettha cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n3:98_0: Etthacāti keci pakkhe ca, kañci pīḷamāvahatīti sambandho, kutoccāha ‘tathāhi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:98_1: Evaṁ maññate- “yadīpi samudāyappasiddhiyā sati kiriyāsaddatthavisayāpekkhā nopajāyate,
anya-e0806n3:98_3: manusse ca tannāmake nāmadheyyassa tacchakasaddassa pavattisabbhāvā(ti) visesanavisessasabbhāvato
anya-e0806n3:98_4: samāsappasaṅgo tadavattho yevā”ti, na kevalaṁ sappavisesasseva tacchakasaddo nāmadheyyamapitu
anya-e0806n3:98_7: Kamenatthappasiddhīti yaṁ, etampana sakkā viññātunti yojanā.
anya-e0806n3:99_0: Yanti yaṁ pasijjhanaṁ, kamenāti bādhābhāvato anukkamena. Evañceti iminā nacetyādinā
anya-e0806n3:99_1: vuttaṁ paccāmasati… kimpaṭivihitaṁ siyā parihaṭaṁ siyāti attho, iti iminā kāraṇena
anya-e0806n3:99_2: ‘tacchako sappo’ti paccudāharaṇaṁ na yuttaṁ… tacchakasappoti samāsasabbhāvatoti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n3:99_3: nedamevamiccādinā pariharati, yadā carati yathā vuttena visesanavisessabhāvasambhavo,
anya-e0806n3:99_4: tadā kathaṁtyāha- ‘yadā visesane’ccādi. Tadāpi kathaṁ vākyena bhavitabbamiccāha-
anya-e0806n3:100_0: Aññassāti kammani sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ chaṭṭhī. Avacchedakattāti ettha kattunā
anya-e0806n3:100_1: bhavitabbanti kāḷassāti kattari bhāvayoge chaṭṭhiyā ajjhāharitabbaṁ. Pattāpannehi
anya-e0806n3:100_2: dutiyantassa jīvikampatto jīvikā pannoti samāso ‘kārakaṁ bahula”nteva (caṁ-2-2-19)
anya-e0806n3:100_3: vihito dutiyantena tu tesaṁ samāsatthaṁ suttantaraṁ kataṁ parehi, atthañca tesamitthiliṅgānampi
anya-e0806n3:100_4: samāseneva, kāranivattiyā, tathā māso jātassāti viggahe parimāṇivācinā chaṭṭhiyantena
anya-e0806n3:100_5: parimāṇavacanānaṁ kālasaddānaṁ, tadāha- ‘pattāpannāna’miccādi, parimāṇaṁ māsādi paricchedo
anya-e0806n3:101_0: Ettha hi māso parimāṇaṁ paricchedakattā, jāto parimāṇī paricchejjattā, pattā jīvikānenāti
anya-e0806n3:101_1: patto jīvikanti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ vacanicchāyaṁ yo-ttho so- ñāpadatthasamāsepyatinno
anya-e0806n3:101_3: taṁ byākhyātukāmo āha- ‘vānekaññatthe iccevā’tiādi. Aññattha samāse kate sabbattha
anya-e0806n3:101_4: “itthiyaṁ bhāsite”ccādinā (3-67) pumbhāvo. Māso jātassāti vacanicchāyaṁ yo-ttho,
anya-e0806n3:102_0: Jātasaddassatthamāha sampannoti, sampuṇṇotyattho, iminā ca māso jāto-ssāti viggahassa
anya-e0806n3:102_1: attho dassito, aññathāti yadi māso tassa aññapadatthassa jātādino sampuṇṇo na bhātīti
anya-e0806n3:102_3: suttena pubbanipāto vutto, tadāha- ‘nace’ccādi, pubbanipātappasaṅgo naca siyātisambandho,
anya-e0806n3:102_4: kutoccāha- ‘jāti’ccādi. Kesañciti vākyakāramāha, naca yuttanti sambandho, kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n3:102_6: sādheti… chaṭṭhīsamāse ‘sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakambhavatīti
anya-e0806n3:103_0: Avacanepīti niyamavacane (a)satīpi, chaṭṭhīsamāsappasaṅgo carahi vuttanayena byavacchejja
anya-e0806n3:103_1: byavacchedakattābhāvena visesanānatthakyā na bhaveyya ce vākyenāpi na bhavitabbanti
anya-e0806n3:103_2: āha- ‘vākyaṁ tvi’ccādi. Ayampana visesanasamāso parehi kammadhārayoti ñāyati… yathā
anya-e0806n3:103_3: kammaṁ kiriyaṁ payojanañca dhāreti evamayaṁ samāso kammamiva dvayaṁ dhārayatīti.
anya-e0806n3:105_0: Etthevāti “ṭa nañssa”iti (3-74) sutteeva. Pāmanaputtotipāmā kuṭṭhaviseso assa atthīti
anya-e0806n3:105_1: pāmasaddā “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120) nappaccayo, pāmanassa putto, yadi hettha
anya-e0806n3:105_2: ñakāro visesanattho na karīyetha, tadā “ṭa nassā”ti suttaṁ karīyetha, tathā ca satyuttarapade
anya-e0806n3:106_0: Siyāti bhāvo, nanu ciha samāsavidhimhi ña kāroccāraṇā ña lopa rahitassa samāso na
anya-e0806n3:106_1: bhavatīti vattumucitaṁ, na tu “ṭa nañssā”ti visesanatthoti ññakāro etthova visesanattho,
anya-e0806n3:106_2: ti bhavitabba saccaṁ, kintviha samāsavidhimhi ña kārassa byavacchajjaṁ na dissate.
anya-e0806n3:107_0: Pariyudāsavuttīti pari tulitamuggayha nisedhanīyassa asanaṁ khepanaṁ vajjanaṁ pariyudāso,
anya-e0806n3:107_1: tena pariyudāsena visiṭṭhe-tthe vutti asseti pariyudāsavutti, pasajjappaṭisedhavuttīti
anya-e0806n3:107_2: paṭisedhanīyameva pasajja patvā taṁsadisamanapekkhiya nisedho, tena vutti asseti
anya-e0806n3:108_0: Yattha brāhmaṇā aññova bhavatītyevaṁ vākyenātthantaravidhānā vidhino padhānattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:108_1: atthantaravidhānasāmatthiyeneva brāhmaṇassa paṭisedho patīyate, brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇassā
anya-e0806n3:108_2: (potthake) nivattane tadapekkhāyāññassa vidhānayogato sakapadena nañkhyena vidhibhāgī
anya-e0806n3:108_3: na vuccate, kiñcarahi aññasaddena… pariyudāsanissayinoññasaddasseva vākye payogato’
anya-e0806n3:108_4: añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇo’ti, nañssaca syādyantena sāmatthiyaṁ, na tyādyantenetyekavākyatā…
anya-e0806n3:108_5: añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇoti tattha tattha pariyudāsavuttittā.
anya-e0806n3:109_0: Pasajjappaṭisedhetu paṭisedhassa padhānattā brāhmaṇo na bhavatīti vākyena brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0806n3:109_1: paṭisedho vidhi atthagammo vākyabhedo, sakapadena ca nañkhyena paṭisedhabhāgivācī
anya-e0806n3:109_2: sambajjhate. Ko so brāhmaṇā aññoti āha- ‘brāhmaṇattānajjhāsito’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:110_0: Itarasminti pasajjappaṭisepekkhe, kenaci saṁsayanimittenāti upavītadassanādinā kenaci
anya-e0806n3:110_1: saṁsayakāraṇena, sabbampi padaṁ sakatthe payogampati ñāṇamapekkhate, tañca ñāṇaṁ
anya-e0806n3:110_2: dvidhā sammāñāṇaṁ micchā ñāṇañca. Ubhayampetabrāhmaṇasaddaṁ pavattayati. Tattha sammāñāṇa
anya-e0806n3:110_3: pubbake abrāhmaṇasaddappayoge natthi nañssa byāpāro, na hi tattha tena kiñci karīyati.
anya-e0806n3:110_4: Micchāñāṇapubbake tu vijjate tassa byāpā ro tattha hi tena micchāñāṇappabhavatā parassākhyāyate,
anya-e0806n3:110_5: micchāñāṇaṁ cendriyahetukaṁ, vinā sadisattaṁ na bhavatīti paṭisedhe sati uttarapadatthasadiso
anya-e0806n3:110_6: samāsattho jāyateccāha- ‘tattha sadisattaṁ vine’ccādi. Rajjuyaṁ hi sappabuddhi sadisattā.
anya-e0806n3:111_1: brāhmaṇamattassānayanaṁ siyā pubbapadassuccāraṇamanatthakaṁ siyā, atha na kassaci
anya-e0806n3:111_2: ānayanaṁ evampi sabbassevā brāhmaṇasaddassānatthakattaṁ, tasmā payogasāmatthiyāpi
anya-e0806n3:112_1: ‘atoyeva vuccate’ccādi. Ayañcettha attho “nañvacanena ivasaddena ca yaṁ yuttaṁ tadaññasmiṁ
anya-e0806n3:112_2: tappadatthasadise-tthe paṭipattiṁ janeti, tathāhyatthasampaccayo loke dissati ‘abrāhmaṇamānayā’ti
anya-e0806n3:112_3: brāhmaṇasadiso khattiyādi ānīyatīti, adhikarīyati niyujjate saddo-smintyadhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:112_4: Yathāvuttena ca byākhyānena kimiṭṭhaṁ siddhantyāha- ‘tadeva’miccādi. Keci pana uttarapadatthappadhānattamiha vaṇṇenti.
anya-e0806n3:113_0: Samatthavādīnanti “samattho padavidhi” (pā 2-1-1) tvevaṁ vādīnaṁ. Samattha vādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n3:113_1: samāso vidheyyoti sambandho, vidheyyoti vacanantarena vidheyyo, tathāhi apunageyyāti
anya-e0806n3:113_2: gāyanena nañssa sambandho, na tu punasaddatthena. Anokāsaṁ kāretvāti karaṇena sambandho
anya-e0806n3:113_3: na okāsena. Amūlāmūlaṁ gantvāti gamanena, na mūlenāti asāmatthiyaṁ. Gamakattavādinoti
anya-e0806n3:113_4: asāmatthiyepi yatra gamakattaṁ tattha samāso hoteva, tato gamakattañca samāsassa
anya-e0806n3:113_5: nibandhananti yo vadati tassetyattho. Etthāpīti apunageyyātyādopi, nanvayamapyācariyo
anya-e0806n3:113_6: gamakattavādī, tathāsati gamakattāiccanabhidhāya bahulādhikārāti kasmāvuttanti āha-‘so ce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:114_0: Kehicīti vuttigganthena byavacchinnamatthaṁ dassento āha- ‘kehiciyeva na sabbehī’ti,
anya-e0806n3:114_1: apunageyyāti “ṭa nañssā”ti (3-74) nassaṭo, atippasaṅgābhāvatoti suttantarena samāse
anya-e0806n3:116_1: gatassa syādividhino, asyādividhimhīti pariyudāso-natthakoti codento āha ‘nanvi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:116_2: anatthakaṁ bhaveyya… lakkhaṇādyatthānaṁ samāse guṇībhūtattā samāsato kiriyāsambandhānurūpavibhattiyatthassa
anya-e0806n3:116_4: yoge dutiyā vidhānasāmatthiyā vākyampi hoti, aññathā niccasamāse dutiyā vidhānamanatthakanti
anya-e0806n3:116_5: bhāvo, nigamayati tasmāiccādinā, “ku pāpatthe”ti paresaṁ gaṇapāṭho, evamuparipi “dunindāyaṁ”tyādi veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:118: Cīsaddoti ettha cīti iminā cīppaccayantaṁ parāmasati, cīppaccayanta saddoti attho.
anya-e0806n3:120: Pītisambhamoti pītiyā sambhamo pītipubbikā paccuṭṭhānāsana dānādivisayā turitatā, alaṁbhutvā pariyattaṁ sampuṇṇaṁ bhutvā.
anya-e0806n3:122_0: Purobhūya aggatobhūya. Tirobhūya antaradhānībhūya. Anaccādhāneti imassa attho ‘upariyādhānato
anya-e0806n3:122_1: aññatrā’ti, ādhānaṁ patiṭṭhāpanaṁ, icchantīti pāṇiniyādayo icchanti, urasi katvā
anya-e0806n3:124_1: vivacchitaṁ ekasaṅkhyāya sāmaññaṁ, evaṁ maññate “yadi‘syādi syādine’ti vattumicchitekasaṅkhyāsāmaññassa
anya-e0806n3:124_2: pariggaho na siyā tadā ihānatthaka (maneka)ggahaṇaṁ siyā tenehāne kaggahaṇasāmatthiyāyeva
anya-e0806n3:124_4: idaṁ dasseti “tena yathāvuttena pubbe vutto sabbopi samāso pubbaparānaṁ dvinnaṁyeva
anya-e0806n3:125_1: vā sijjhati, ayaṁ aññapadatthasamāso. Catthe bahunnamiṭṭhattā tadatthañcānekaggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:125_2: tena ‘hotu potu pitā puttā’ti hoti uttarapade (yoni) sambandhe parato pubbapadassa
anya-e0806n3:125_3: “putte”ti (3-65) suttenāttena, aññathā dvinnaṁdvinnaṁ samāse sabbattha uttarapadasambhavena
anya-e0806n3:125_5: potā pitā puttā’ti āpajjeyya. Anekanti paṭhamantattā syādītīdamevānuvattate, tenevānekaṁ
anya-e0806n3:125_6: syādyantamicceva vuttaṁ. Athāññattheti vutte-ññassa vākyassattheti avatvā padassecceva
anya-e0806n3:125_7: kasmā vuttantyāsaṅkiyā ha- ‘syādyantasse’ccādi, tassevāti sāmatthiyaladdhassa syādyanta
anya-e0806n3:126_0: Tassa guṇā tagguṇā tasseccanenāññapadattho niddisīyate, tassa aññapadatthassa ye
anya-e0806n3:126_1: guṇā yāni visesanāni, tesaṁ saṁviññāṇaṁ gahaṇaṁ tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaṁ, athavā so guṇo
anya-e0806n3:126_2: yassa so tagguṇo, tagguṇassa tagguṇayuttassāññapadatthassasaṁviññāṇaṁ, na guṇavirahitassā(ti)
anya-e0806n3:126_3: tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaṁ, ettha pana ‘aññapadatthe tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaṁ pyatthī’ti paribhāsīyati,
anya-e0806n3:126_4: tatthāyamattho “aññapadatthe samāse-ññapadattho visesanena saha viññāyati navisesanarahito”ti,
anya-e0806n3:126_5: kvaci atagguṇasaṁviññāṇassāpi dassane nāpisaddo, yatrāvayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho
anya-e0806n3:126_6: tattheva tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaṁ bhavati, tagguṇasaṁviññāṇato aññaṁ atagguṇasaṁviññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:127: Ettha pana bahudhanasaddo purisassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena katattā. Abhimatoti pāṇinīyānaṁ abhimato dasannaṁ samīpe āsannā dasannamiccādivākye.
anya-e0806n3:128: Parimāṇamevasaṅkhyeyanti parimāṇalakkhaṇameva saṅkhyeyaṁ, tañca parimāṇalakkhaṇaṁ saṅkhyeyañca.
anya-e0806n3:131: Saṅkhyānavuttīti tena anativattiyamānatapparicchedaka saṅkhyānarūpa saṅkhāte saṅkhyāne vutti yassā sā saṅkhyānavutti-pañcasaṅkhyā.
anya-e0806n3:132_0: Diṭṭhanteniminā imaṁ dīpeti “yathā pañca parimāṇamesanti pañcakāti ettha parimāṇarūpo-vayavabhedasamudāyasabhāvo
anya-e0806n3:132_1: pakatiyattho samudāyino sakunā paccayattho, tathā tidasāti etthāpi”ti, kappaccayo
anya-e0806n3:134: Pakatippaccayatthabhedasambhavāti iminā paresaṁ pakatippaccayatthānaṁ bhedābhāvassa icchitattā saññāyaṁ sakatthe kappaccayassa vidhānaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:136_0: Tadatthepīti tassa vāiti aññapadassa atthepi, tadattho cettha vikappattho vā siyā
anya-e0806n3:136_1: tadā pana dvinnaṁ gahaṇe na tiṇṇaṁ, tesantu gahaṇe na dvinnaṁ, saṁsayo vā, tadā tu
anya-e0806n3:136_2: saṁsayassobhayā lambanarūpattā dvevāti vutte tayo, tayovāti vutte dve apekkhīyantīti
anya-e0806n3:137: Nāmattenāti ruḷhināmattena, abhimato pāṇiniyānaṁ, vikappitaṁ suttantarena vibhāsā sabbanāmasaññāvidhānena.
anya-e0806n3:139_0: Nanu ca samānādhikaraṇānaṁ bahubbīhi vutto pāṇiniyehi ‘pañcahi bhuttamasseti byadhikaraṇānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:139_1: na siyā’ti, tathā paṭhamatthaṁ vajjetvā sabbavibhatyatthesu iṭṭho ‘vuṭṭhe devegatoccatra
anya-e0806n3:139_2: vuṭṭhadevoti na siyā’ti tasmā kathamatra byadhikaraṇānaṁ paṭhamatthe samāso vaṇṇīyateccāsaṅkiyāha-‘byadhikaraṇānampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:139_4: anabhidhānato vā na bhavissati, tatoyeva ca pañca bhutta vanto-sseti samānādhikaraṇānampi
anya-e0806n3:139_5: kvaci na bhavissati, tathā paṭhamatthepi kvaci na bhavissati vuṭṭhe deve gato’ti.
anya-e0806n3:140_0: Aññatracāti tulyayogato-ññatra salomakotyādīsu ca, vijjamānāni lomānyassa, vijjamānā
anya-e0806n3:140_2: (2-2-24-vā) sabhāvato eva nivatto na suttantarato, gatatthassāpi hi payoge anavaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:140_3: siyā piṭṭhapesane viya, kathañcarahi brāhmaṇe bahū ānaya, ahaṁ pacāmīti nāvassamevaṁ
anya-e0806n3:140_4: payogo, katthaci pana vacanasiliṭṭhatādippayojane sati hoteva.
anya-e0806n3:141_0: Kaṇṭhe sambhavoti kāḷassa kaṇṭhe sambhavo. Ṭṭhasaddatthoti kaṇṭhaṭṭhasadde ṭṭhasaddattho.
anya-e0806n3:141_2: tasmā oṭṭhova mukhamassāti viggayha oṭṭhamukhoti samāso, na ca pāṇi pāṇyantarassa
anya-e0806n3:141_3: mukhaṁ, mukheneva ca pāṇimukhassa sadisattaṁ pasiddhanti sāmatthiyā oṭṭhamukhamiva
anya-e0806n3:141_5: kāḷo yassā’tyādīkameva vākyanti dasseti. Samudāye vikārecāti samudāyasambandhe vikārasambandhe
anya-e0806n3:141_6: ca. Taṁsamāsassāti tassā chaṭṭhiyā samāsassa, tadabhidhāyinanti saṅghāta vikārābhidhāyīnaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:141_7: kesānaṁ saṅghāto iccādi paresaṁ vākyaṁ. Dhātuto jātaṁ dhātujaṁ, uttarapadaṁ patitasaddādi,
anya-e0806n3:142_1: tu avijjamānasaddo nañsamāso, padantare nāssa bahubbīhi vottarapadalopo, avijjamānā
anya-e0806n3:142_2: puttāssa aputtovijjamānaputtoti sādhenti, icchate pāṇinīyehi… dakkhiṇapubbā saddānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:142_3: nānatthattā byadhikaraṇattā, vacanepīti sutte vijjamānepi, aya maññapadatthasamāso
anya-e0806n3:142_4: parehi bahubbīhīti vuccati tathāhi bahavo vihayo yassa so bahubbīhi, yathā bahubbīhīti
anya-e0806n3:144_0: Samuccīti piṇḍīkaraṇaṁ, ko soti āha- ‘sādhanameka’miccādi. Ekaṁ sādhanaṁ ekaṁ kiriyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:144_1: vā paṭicca cīyamānatāti sambandho, kesanti āha- ‘kiriyāsādhanāna’nti, kenāti āha-
anya-e0806n3:144_2: ‘attarūpabhedenā”ti. Tattha devadatto bhuñjati tiṭṭhati pacaticāti sādhanampaṭicca
anya-e0806n3:144_3: kiriyānaṁ attarūpabhedena cīyamānatā veditabbā, dhave ca khadire ca palāse ca chindāti
anya-e0806n3:145: Soti samuccayo bhavatīti seso, kesanti āha- ‘tulya balāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n3:146: Tulyabalānanti iminā visuṁ padhānabhāvena kiriyābhisambandhā aññamaññānapekkhattamāha.
anya-e0806n3:147_0: Aniyatakkamayogapajjānanti kamo ca yogapajjañca, aniyataṁ kamayogapajjaṁ yesaṁ saddānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:147_1: tesaṁ, yathetyādinā tatthodāharaṇaṁ dasseti, etthāyamadhippāyo “ettha gavādīnaṁ visuṁ
anya-e0806n3:147_3: aniyatakkamatā gavādīnaṁ yugapadi nayanābhāvā aniyata yogapajjatā ca hoti, tathā
anya-e0806n3:147_4: aññaṁ tādisampī”ti. Anu pacchā padhānānurodhena (cayanaṁ) anvācayo, taṁ byañjayati
anya-e0806n3:147_6: padhānamantaraṅgattā, netaraṁ bahiraṅgattā, taṁ karaṇe yadi gāvopi passati tāpyānayati,
anya-e0806n3:147_7: ettha tu gossānayanaṁ bhikkhāṭanamapekkhate, netaramitarassa… vināpi tena tadanuṭṭhānato.
anya-e0806n3:147_8: Itarassa itarena yo go itaretarayogo, so ca etādisoti āha- ‘aññamaññe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:148_0: Avayavappadhāno cāti sābhāvikābhidhānasāmatthiyenāputhubhūto ca, vuttivayena sāriputtasaddo
anya-e0806n3:148_1: moggallānattho hoti moggallānasaddo sāriputtatthopīti aññamaññatthe padhānato yugapadyadhikaraṇavacane
anya-e0806n3:148_2: sati cattha samāsoti so-yamadhikaraṇa samudāyo ubhayapadānugataubhayatthavasena catubbidhopi
anya-e0806n3:148_3: yugapadi buddhiyā gayhamāno kadāci ubbhūtāvayavabhedo teneva sābhāvikābhidhānasāmatthiyeneccevamavayavappadhāno
anya-e0806n3:148_4: ca, nanu ca jananamaraṇānīti viruddhānaṁ kathamekenābhidhānanti vuccate- sabbopi
anya-e0806n3:148_5: saddo payujjamāno (itarī) tarenāvadhāraṇaṁ vattate, tena ekeko saddo ekekassatthassa
anya-e0806n3:148_6: vācako, tathāpi yathā sāriputtamoggallānāti ettha bahuvacanassaññathānupapattiyā
anya-e0806n3:148_8: sāmatthiyena ekenāpyabhidhānaṁ hoti. Iti hetumhi, yato evamavayavappadhāno tatoti attho.
anya-e0806n3:149_0: Bahuttāti kiñcāpi vākye nesaṁ vākyenevesaṁ (potthake) visuṁ bahvatthatā, na hi sāriputtamānayāti
anya-e0806n3:149_1: vutte moggallānassāpi sampaccayo bhavati, tathāpi yato vuttivisaye sahabhūtānamevesaṁ
anya-e0806n3:149_2: visuṁ bahvatthatā, tato tattha vacanīyassa atthassa saṅkhyātedena bahuttaṁ. Samāharaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n3:149_3: piṇḍīkaraṇavasena saṁharaṇaṁ samāhāro, so cevaṁ veditabboti dassetumāha ‘aññamaññe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:150_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi itarītarayogassa samāhārassa ca bhāvarūpattā adabbarūpatā, tathāpītarītarayoge
anya-e0806n3:150_1: tu yathā guṇavaca nānaṁ sukkaṁ vatthaṁ sukko kambalo sukkā gāvīti nissayabhedato
anya-e0806n3:150_2: liṅgavacanasiddhi, tathā taddhammānamabhidhānato nissayato liṅgavacana siddhi veditabbā,
anya-e0806n3:150_3: saṁhatippadhānattācekavacananti yadā bahunnaṁ samudāyo tirohitāvayavabhedo saṁghāto
anya-e0806n3:150_4: pakkamīyate, tadā samāhārocceva saṁhatippadhānattā ekavacanaṁ hotīti attho. Tadanuṭṭhānatoti
anya-e0806n3:150_5: tassa karaṇato. Byatikaro missatā, byatikaraṁ dasseti pāṇiccādinā, paccekaṁ parisamattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:151_0: Cakkhuñca sotañca, mukhañca nāsikā ca, hanu ca gīvā ca, chavi ca maṁsañca lohitañca,
anya-e0806n3:151_1: nāmañca rūpañca, jarā ca maraṇañcāti viggayha samāso, “samāhāre napuṁsaka”nti (3-20)
anya-e0806n3:151_2: sabbattha napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ, syādimhi mukha nāsikantiādīsu “syādīsu rasso”ti (3-23)
anya-e0806n3:151_3: rasso. Alabhatā gomukhaṁ ḍiṇḍimo bherivisesā, āḷambaraṁ paṇavo, murajo mudaṅgo, maddavo
anya-e0806n3:151_4: mudaṅgo. Maddavavādanaṁ paṇavavādanañca sippamassa maddaviko pāṇaviko, sammaṁ kaṁsatāḷaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:151_5: tāḷaṁ hatthatāḷaṁ, alasatā ca āḷambaro ca, murajo ca, gomukho ca, saṅkho ca ḍiṇḍimo
anya-e0806n3:151_6: ca, maddaviko ca, pāṇaviko ca, gītañca vāditañca, sammañca tāḷañcāti viggaho. Yugassa
anya-e0806n3:151_7: hitā yoggā goṇā, tesamidaṁ yoggaṁ kasikammaṁ, tassa aṅgaṁ. Tenāha- ‘kasibhaṇḍāna’nti,
anya-e0806n3:151_8: phālokasako, pācanaṁ patodo, yugo ca naṅgalañcāti viggaho. Piṇḍamāyudhaviseso, asi
anya-e0806n3:151_9: ca satti ca tomarañca piṇḍañcāti viggaho. Cammaṁ saravāraṇaphalakaṁ, kalāpo tūṇīraṁ,
anya-e0806n3:151_10: paharaṇañca āvaraṇañcāti viggaho. Ahi ca nakulo ca, bīḷāro ca mūsiko ca, kāko ca
anya-e0806n3:151_11: ulūko ca, nāgo ca supaṇṇocāti viggaho. Saṅkhyā ca parimāṇañca saṅkhyāparimāṇaṁ, tattha
anya-e0806n3:151_12: parimāṇasaññānaṁ yathādīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṁ. Ekakañca dukañcāti viggaho,
anya-e0806n3:152: Khuddajantu siyā- naṭṭhi, athavā khuddakova yo;
anya-e0806n3:153: Sataṁ vā pasate yesaṁ, keci ānakulā api.
anya-e0806n3:154_0: Kīṭo ca pataṅgo ca, kuntho ca kipilliko ca, ḍaṁso ca makaso ca, makkhikā ca kipillikācāti
anya-e0806n3:154_1: viggaho. Pacanacaṇḍālāti o rabbhikādīnaṁ ruḷhīsaññā. Urabbhe hantvā jīvatīti orabbhiko,
anya-e0806n3:154_2: evaṁ sesesu. Sānaṁ sunakhaṁ pacatīti sapāko, venā tacchakā, rathakārā cammakārā.
anya-e0806n3:154_3: Sādhāraṇā samānā, caraṇasaddo- yaṁ idha gayhatīti sambandho, yathā sakamajjhayanāya
anya-e0806n3:154_4: carīyanti vatānyetesūti caraṇāni, kaṭhādivājhānyajjhayanāni sākhāsaññakāni. Yasmā
anya-e0806n3:154_5: etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṁ disaṁ, tasmā caraṇāni sīlādayo paṇṇarasa
anya-e0806n3:154_6: dhammā. Tenāha- ‘kaṭhādīhī’tiādi, kaṭhādīhīti pasiddhivasena kamātikkamenāpi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:154_7: tato ādisaddena atisādayo gayhanti. Atisena bhāradvājena kaṭhena vuttaṁ vidantyadhīyanti
anya-e0806n3:154_8: vāti “aññasmi”ti (4-121) ṇo, “lopo”ti (4-123) lopo atisā bhāradvājā kaṭhā. Kalāpinā
anya-e0806n3:154_9: vuttaṁ vidantyadhīyanti vāti, teneva ṇo, kalāpā, kaṭhā ādi yesaṁ te kaṭhādayo, tehi
anya-e0806n3:154_10: ajjhenavisese ca purise ca upacārāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:155_0: Sīlādayotiādisaddena indriyasaṁvarādayo gayhanti. Sīlañca paññāṇañca, samatho ca
anya-e0806n3:155_1: vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañcāti viggaho. Ekato ajjhayanametesūti ekajjhayanāni,
anya-e0806n3:155_2: pakaṭhāni vacanāni pāvacanāni saddhammo, ekajjhayanāni ca tāni pāvacanāni ca tesaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:155_3: dīgho ca dīghāgamo ca majjhimo ca majjhimāgamo ca, ekuttaro ca aṅguttarāgamo ca saṁyuttāgamo
anya-e0806n3:156_0: Tesanti iminā liṅgavisesānanti chaṭṭhiyantataṁ dīpeti, itthī ca pumā ca, dāsī ca
anya-e0806n3:156_1: dāso ca, cīvarañca piṇḍapāto ca senāsanañca gilānapaccayo bhesajjaparikkhāro ca,
anya-e0806n3:156_2: tiṇañca kaṭṭho ca sākhā ca palāso cāti viggaho. Cheko dakkho, pubbā ca parācātiādinā viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:157_0: Pubbadakkhiṇantiādīsu “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso. Kāso ca kuso ca usiro
anya-e0806n3:157_1: ca bīraṇañca, muñjañca babbajañcāti viggaho. Khadiro ca palāsocātiādinā ca, gajo
anya-e0806n3:157_2: ca gavajo cātiādinā ca, hatthī ca goca asso ca vaḷavācāti ca, haṁso ca balāvā cātiādinā
anya-e0806n3:157_3: ca, bako ca balākācāti ca. Hiraññañca suvaṇṇo ca, maṇi ca saṅkho ca muttā ca veḷuriyo
anya-e0806n3:157_4: ca jātarūpañca rajatañcāti ca, sāli ca yavakocātiādinā ca, sākañca suvañcātiādināca,
anya-e0806n3:157_5: kāsiyo ca kosalācātiādinā ca viggaho, janapadavācinā ca bahuvacanantā.
anya-e0806n3:158_0: Ekavīsaticcādino ekañca taṁ vīsaticāti visesanasamāso vā siyā, ekañca vīsati ca ekavīsatīti
anya-e0806n3:158_1: catthasamāso vā, samāhāre napuṁsakattantu na pappoti, “nānusāsanīyaṁ liṅgaṁ sokanissayattā
anya-e0806n3:158_2: liṅgasse”ti loke napuṁsakaliṅgassehānabhidhānato napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ na bhavissatītyadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n3:158_3: sabhāparisāyāti ñāpakato vā samāhāre napuṁsakaliṅgamatra byabhicaratīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:159_0: Pubbappayogo-bhimatoti upasajjanasaññakassa syādīti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhassa samāse
anya-e0806n3:159_1: pubbanipāto “upasajjanaṁ pubba”miccanena (2-2-31) iṭṭho kamassa padhānabhāvena vattumiṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n3:159_3: syādineti tatiyāniddiṭṭhassa pacchāvaṭṭhānato “syādisyādinā”ti sutte paṭipāṭiyā padhānabhāvena vattumiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n3:160_0: Parappayogo-bhimatoti heṭṭhā vuttasuttena pubbanipāte patte “rājadantādīsu para”ntīminā
anya-e0806n3:161_0: Kamampaccanādarāti iminā padhānabhāvenā-kkamassa vattumiṭṭhattamāha. Saro ādi yassa
anya-e0806n3:161_1: taṁ sarādi, saṅkho ca dundubhi ca vīṇā ca, udukkhalañca musalo ca, dhanapati ca rāmo
anya-e0806n3:161_2: ca kesavocāti viggaho. Jaṁdaṁsaddā jāyāsaddasamānatthā asaṅkhyā-jañca pati ca, dañca
anya-e0806n3:161_3: paticāti viggaho, avantayo ca assakāca, aggi ca indocāti viggaho, taṁnivāsimhi gahite
anya-e0806n3:161_4: avanti ca assakocāti ekattenapi viggaho vattati. Dvandasamāso- yaṁ dvandasadisattā
anya-e0806n3:161_5: dvando, dve ca dve ca padāni dvandānīti hi ubhayatthappadhāno- yaṁ dvandasaddo.
anya-e0806n3:163_0: Atha “samāhāre napuṁsaka”nti (3-20) vijjamāne kiṁ “saṅkhyādī” ti iminā satthagāravakarenāti
anya-e0806n3:164_0: Neti iminā catthetiādinā kataparikappanā na sijjhatīti dasseti, tattha hetumāha-
anya-e0806n3:169_1: kātabboti “saṅkhyāpubbo digū”ti (2-1-52) saṅkhyāpubbassa samāsassa digusaññaṁ vidhāya
anya-e0806n3:170_0: Samāharaṇaṁ samāhāroti iminā bhāvasādhano-yaṁ samāhārasaddo. Yadi samāharīyatīti
anya-e0806n3:170_1: samāhāroti kammasādhano siyā, tadā pañca kumāriyo samāhaṭāti vākyassātthe vutti siyā
anya-e0806n3:170_3: (3-24) appadhānarassattañca na siyā… samāhaṭānameva kumārīnaṁ padhānattā, tasmā pañca
anya-e0806n3:170_4: gāvo sa māhaṭātyetasmiṁ vākye samāsova natthi kammasādhanassānupagamato. Pañcannaṁ
anya-e0806n3:170_5: gunnaṁ samāhāro, catunnaṁ pathānaṁ samāhāroti vākye pana atthi, samāhārassekattā
anya-e0806n3:170_6: tu sataṁ yūthaṁ vananti ettha viya sābhāvikamekavacanaṁ siddhameveti viññāpeti.
anya-e0806n3:172_0: Kvacisaddassa payoganiyamanattho “paro kvicī”ti (1-27) ettha vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0806n3:172_1: Avisesena udāharaṇepīti paresaṁ viya “chāyā”ti (2-2-73) suttayitvā vikappena ‘(kuḍḍacchāya)
anya-e0806n3:172_3: ca nodāharitvā sāmaññena ‘salabhacchāyaṁ sakuntacchāya’nti udāharaṇe dassitepi. Aññatthāti
anya-e0806n3:172_4: bahulabhāvato aññattha. Viggahasamattassāti viggahasāmaññassa, yathāsambhavanti pāsādassa
anya-e0806n3:174_0: Nanuceccādinā vuttaṁ codanaṁ nisedheti ‘tanne’ti. Tattha kāraṇamāha- ‘ghasaññattā’tyādi.
anya-e0806n3:174_1: Aghonanti ghaokāravajjitānaṁ, nanu itthi yamākāro gho, tathāsati napuṁsake so (na
anya-e0806n3:174_2: siyāti) parikappeti ‘napuṁsakattā ghattameva natthīti cedi’ti. Tampi neti yathā vuttampaṭikkhipitvā
anya-e0806n3:174_4: Napuṁsake ghattassa napuṁsakattassa (potthake) sabbhāvameva samattheti napuṁsakattaṁ
anya-e0806n3:174_5: hi’ccādinā, pāribhāsikanti ettha suttamevādhippetaṁ, paribhāsāya nibbattaṁ pāribhāsikaṁ
anya-e0806n3:174_8: Etaṁ ghanissitaṁ kāriyaṁ naca yuttanti sambandho. Ayuttattepi doso-yamāpatatevākyāsaṅkiyāha-‘nāyampidoso’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:174_9: na rassassa ettheva laddhāvasarattā paṭhamaṁ tena paviṭṭhe… (ghani)ssitaṁ kāriyanti
anya-e0806n3:174_10: nāyampi doso paribhāsāva senāti mantabbaṁ. Salabhacchāye iti padacchedo.
anya-e0806n3:178: Sakatthapariccāgena kule pavattattāti iminā chaṭṭhīsamāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattamāha.
anya-e0806n3:180_1: nāmavisesanaṁ vā siyā paccayatthavisesanaṁ vā, tattha nāmavisesanamevidaṁ na paccayatthavisesananti
anya-e0806n3:180_3: nāmasmā. Itthattanti ettha itthīti itthiliṅgaṁ vuccati. Itthiyeva hi esāti liṅgīyati
anya-e0806n3:180_4: saṅketīyatīti liṅgaṁ. Itthiyā esāti pasiddhimato atthassa bhāvo sāmaññaṁ bālayuvattādi
anya-e0806n3:185_0: Atthesu yesu esā eso etanti pasiddhi lokassa hoti etāni yathākkamaṁ itthipurisanapuṁsakaliṅgānīti
anya-e0806n3:185_1: lokena vuccantīti attho. Evañcakatvā vuccate “liṅgaṁ nānusāsanīyaṁ lokanissa yattā
anya-e0806n3:185_2: liṅgassā”ti. Tattha goiccādīsvesā esoti pasiddhiyā itthiliṅgattaṁ, acciādīsvesā etanti
anya-e0806n3:185_3: pasiddhiyā itthinapuṁsakattaṁ, taṭobhaṭī taṭamiccādīsveso esāetanti pasiddhiyā pumitthinapuṁsakattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:185_4: mālāiccādīsvesāti pasiddhiyā itthattaṁ, rukkhoccādīsvesoti pasiddhiyā pulliṅgattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:185_5: kulamiccādo etanti pasiddhiyā napuṁsakattaṁ. Samāsassāpyevaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, jotakāti
anya-e0806n3:185_6: dassetīti sambandho. Jotakā itthattasseti pakaraṇato viññāyati. Tato veccādinā paccayatthabhāvino
anya-e0806n3:185_7: ye dosā tesametthanāvakāsoti dasseti. Samānādhikaraṇattaṁ bahuvacanampi hotītisambandho.
anya-e0806n3:185_8: Iminā idaṁ dīpeti “itthattassa paccayatthatte sati padhānattāssa byatirekalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0806n3:185_9: chaṭṭhiyā ‘kumārittaṁ (devadattāyā’tibhavitabbaṁ, tato ca na siyā kumārī) devadattā’ti
anya-e0806n3:185_10: samānādhikaraṇattaṁ, tathā kumāriyoti bahuvacanampi itthattassekattā. Pakatiyattha
anya-e0806n3:185_11: visesanapakkhe tu pakatiyā itthattavisiṭṭhaṁ dabbamevoccate, āādayo tu jotakatāti
anya-e0806n3:185_12: tattha byatirekābhāvā chaṭṭhiyā appasaṅgo ca bahuvacanampi anekattāva dabbassa yuttanti
anya-e0806n3:185_13: yathāvuttadosāvasarābhāvā iṭṭhatthasiddhī”ti. Aññeti jayādicca jinindabuddhyācariyādayo dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:186_2: no papajjate nopapajjeyya (pañcikā) devadattāsaddavacanīyassāpi itthattato abyatirittattā
anya-e0806n3:186_3: ‘itthattaṁ devadattāyā’ti bhinnādhikaraṇatā na yujjate, anupapattimeva samattheti
anya-e0806n3:187_0: Atoevāti itthatte āvidhānatoyeva. Tabbatotthassāti idaṁ jayādiccādimatānugāminā nugāmī
anya-e0806n3:187_1: pana (potthake) vuttaṁ, tathā hi te evaṁ liṅgalakkhaṇa māhu (pā, 4-1-3 kāsikāyaṁ)
anya-e0806n3:187_2: “sāmaññavisesā itthattādayo gottādayo viya bahuppakārabyattiyoti sāmaññāni ca tulyajātiyapadatthasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n3:187_3: tāni visesā ca añña maññehi vijātiyeti ca visissante byāvattanteti sāmaññavisesā.
anya-e0806n3:187_4: byañjīyantiā etehīti byattiyo sāmaññavisesānaṁ nissayā, bahuppakārā byatti yo yesaṁ
anya-e0806n3:187_5: sāmaññavisesānaṁ te tathāvuttāti– (kāsikāvivaraṇa pañjikā.) te hyevaṁ maññante “yathā
anya-e0806n3:187_6: gottādayo samānajātiyesu sabbesvanuvattante, vijātiyehi pana nivattante, tathā itthattādayopi.
anya-e0806n3:187_7: Vicittattā pana sāmaññavisesanissayānaṁ byañjakānaṁ kociyeva sāmaññaviseso kenacideva
anya-e0806n3:187_8: nissayena byañjate, na sabbo sabbena (pati) niyatavisayattā bhāvasattīnaṁ, tattha
anya-e0806n3:187_9: yenatthena itthattameva byañjate na pumattaṁ nāpi napuṁsakattaṁ, sā itthiyeva bhavati
anya-e0806n3:187_10: na pumā nāpi napuṁsakaṁ. Yena pumattameva byañjate, so pumāyeva. Yena tu napuṁsakattaṁ
anya-e0806n3:187_11: taṁ napuṁsakameva. Yo tu dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ (vā) byañjako, so dviliṅgo tiliṅgo ve”ti
anya-e0806n3:187_12: (pā, 4-1-3 kāsikāvivaraṇapañjikā) tasmā pabbato yathā vuttaitthattavato atthassa
anya-e0806n3:188_0: Atheccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya jinindabuddhinā yadupavaṇṇi taṁ taṁ parikappeti.
anya-e0806n3:188_1: So eva carahiccādinā upahāsapubbakamuttara mācikkhate. Masimakkhitakukkuṭoviyāti
anya-e0806n3:188_2: yadā koci aññakukkuṭo aññasmā bhīto siyā, tadā vijayino kukkuṭassa mukhaṁ masiyā
anya-e0806n3:188_3: makkhetvā upanenti so paṭhamaṁ tato bhītopi puna aññoti mantvā yujjhitumussahate.
anya-e0806n3:188_4: Yathātra sova kukkuṭo byāje nopadassito, tathā trāmītyattho.
anya-e0806n3:190: Puṁyogena bhariyāyaṁ vattamānatova niyamena “mātulāditvānī bhariyāyaṁ” (3-33) tyānī, iminā tvaniyamena bhariyāyamabhariyāyañca inītyaniyamena vattumāha- ‘ārāmikassa bhariyā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n3:192_0: Ttimhāti ettake vuttepi ttippaccayantatoti vacane kāraṇamāha-kevalassa aññapadatthe
anya-e0806n3:192_1: payogābhāvā’ti. Iminā paccayaggahaṇaparibhāsamantarenāpi sāmatthiyenevāyamatthaviseso labbhatīti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n3:194: Taṁsanniyogāti tena nīppaccayena sanniyogā ekībhāvā, ayametthādhippāyo ‘yattha nīppaccayo tattheva yalopo’ti.
anya-e0806n3:196_1: samaññābhūtā, puṁyogenāti purisena saha sambandhena hetunā. Itthiyaṁ vattantīti soyamityabhedavacanicchāyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:196_2: yadā bhariyāsaṅkhātāyamitthiyaṁ vattante, nadādipāṭhāti vutte viññāyati ‘ākatigaṇattā
anya-e0806n3:196_3: nadādipāṭho honto evaṁ hotī’ti dasseti, punnāmasmāyogāapālakantāti nadādipāṭhatoti
anya-e0806n3:196_4: atthoti seso. Idañca nadādīsu gaṇasuttanti veditabbaṁ, tassa atthaṁ vadati-‘pumuno’iccādi,
anya-e0806n3:198_0: Puthusaddato saññāyaṁ vīppaccayaṁ samattheti‘puthubhūtā pathavīti hi mahī vuccatī”ti,
anya-e0806n3:198_1: puthubhūtāti hi iminā pathavīsaddassa puthusaddabhūtattaṁ viññāpeti, mahī vuccatīti
anya-e0806n3:198_2: iminā nadādipāṭhā saññāyaṁ vīppaccayattaṁ, puthubhūtā patthaṭāti attho.
anya-e0806n3:200_0: Parādhikārato paccayassa paravidhināva sāmīpyassa siddhattā sādhīpyavacanassantasaddassa
anya-e0806n3:200_1: gahaṇamanatthakaṁ siyāti mantvāvayavavacano yamantasaddo gayhatīti dassento āha-
anya-e0806n3:200_2: ‘tassa anto’iccādi. Avasānavati+avayavoti padacchedo, samāsaggahaṇena gahaṇe kāraṇamāha-‘avayavattā’ti.
anya-e0806n3:200_4: rukkhassa pallavānamavayavattaṁ viya samāsato uttarakālaṁ vidhīya mānassa akārassa
anya-e0806n3:202_0: Atikkantamaṅguliyoti viggaho. Dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭāti paraviggahenātthamāha, dve
anya-e0806n3:202_1: aṅguliyo pamāṇamassāti viggahenevaṁ samāso tato mattappaccaye tagghappaccaye vā tassa
anya-e0806n3:202_2: “lopo”ti (4-123) iminā lope kate visesanasamāsā akāroti dassetuṁ ‘katha’miccādinā
anya-e0806n3:202_3: yaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ dassetuṁ ‘aññapadatthe’ccādi vuttaṁ. Samāsavidhānaṁ atopīti mattādippaccayalopaṁ
anya-e0806n3:202_5: māne paccayalopavasena vināva appaccayena niṭṭhappattīti mantvā ‘aṅgulasaddo vā’ccādinā
anya-e0806n3:202_6: yaṁ vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ tattha āsaṅkaṁ viracayati ‘athe’ccādi. Dvaṅgulasaddassa pamāṇinivattanato
anya-e0806n3:202_7: kathañcipi aññapadatthatā siyāti ‘yathā tathā aññapadatthe vattatū’tivuttaṁ. Nanu
anya-e0806n3:202_8: niraṅgulantyādi sabbamaṅgulasaddena sādhetuṁ sakkā, tathā sati kimaṅguli saddā appaccayavidhānenetyāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n3:202_9: payojanantaraṁ apadisitumāha- ‘sabbatthe’ccādi. Aṅgulisaddato appaccaye avihite niraṅguliccādipi
anya-e0806n3:204_0: Dīgharattantyādo nānusiṭṭhattā liṅgavisesassa kathaṁ napuṁsakattameviccāsaṅkiya codeti
anya-e0806n3:205_0: Ahorattanti samāhāre (cattha) samāsā napuṁsakattaṁ. Atirattoti pulliṅge pādisamāso,
anya-e0806n3:205_1: samudāyasaddassāpyavayave vutti sabbhāvato ekadesavacano pubbarattādo rattisaddoccāha-‘pubbā
anya-e0806n3:205_2: ca sā ratti cā’tiādi. Evamekarattanti pāṭhena na bhavitabbaṁ… tassa samāhārena samāsattābhāvā.
anya-e0806n3:206: Asamāsantapakkheti samāsantaappaccayassābhāvapakkhe. Pubbā atikkantā ratti pubbarattī(ti ratti saddo) nekadesavacanoti samāsantābhāvo.
anya-e0806n3:208: Nanuceccādinā yathāpāditadosaṁ nāyaṁ dosoti pariharati. Syādilopassiccādinā sulabhasyādi lopato pyasulabhataddhita lopova alopetīminā parāmaṭṭhuṁ yuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:210_0: Rattindivaṁ bhuñjatīti payoge ādheyye bhojanasaṅkhāte apekkhite ratyādayo ādeyyasāpekkhā,
anya-e0806n3:210_1: tesampi iminā nipāta nenevātimatā samāsassa siddhīti dassento āha- ‘rattandiva’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n3:210_2: ratti ca divācāti viggaho, catthasamāse tu ra(ttindi) vā.
anya-e0806n3:212_0: Samāsattho (ettha) dāru, nāssa mukhyāhi aṅgulīhi sambandho yujjati, nanu dve aṅgulī
anya-e0806n3:212_1: pamāṇamassa dārunoccādiṁ mukhyo aṅgulisaddogahitoti sambandho sambhavati kimevaṁ
anya-e0806n3:212_3: aṅguli saddassa dāruno pamāṇavācakattā vuttaṁ- ‘dāruno sambandho atthī’ti. Visesanasamāsato
anya-e0806n3:212_7: tabbidhāne tassa appaccayassa vidhāne payojanaṁsissokārotisambandho. Iminā kaccāyanānaṁ
anya-e0806n3:212_8: pakaraṇe payojanaṁ dassitaṁ. Athaca panettha “kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti (ka,
anya-e0806n3:212_9: 2-7-22) iminā akārantassa samāsante kate sāmatthiyā ‘syāca’iti (ka, 2-3-29) sissākārādesābhāvā
anya-e0806n3:212_10: niccamokārantarūpaṁ sampajjatīti parikappiyatassāyuttabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ yaṁ vuttaṁvuttikārena,
anya-e0806n3:212_11: taṁ dassetumāha‘akārantassapi’ccādi, yaṁ-vuttaṁ sissākārā desanivattane akārakaraṇe
anya-e0806n3:212_12: sāmatthiyaṁ, tadabhāvā sissākārādeso na nivārīyatīti dassetumāha-‘nace’ccādi. Caritatthatāya
anya-e0806n3:212_13: niṭṭhitappayojanatāya, teneva kaccāyanavuttikāreneva appaccayanta mudāhaṭaṁ sakkataganthānusārena,
anya-e0806n3:212_14: abyañjanantattāti iminā tiṇṇamesaṁ saddānaṁ sakkate byañjanantattameva bodheti, niratthakanti
anya-e0806n3:214: Aññamaññakiriyeti kiriyāparivattanamāha, iminā sutte kiriya saddābhāvepi vītiharaṇasaddeneva kiriyābyatihāreti labbhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:220: Āparicchedāvasānā na pare parena (potthake) tato paraṁ ṇādikāriyavidhānā.
anya-e0806n3:222_2: bhāvoti vākye“tassa bhāvakammesuttatā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-56) tto, vibhattilopo,
anya-e0806n3:228: Apavādavisayepīti “vijjāyonisambandhānamā tatra catthe”ti (3-64) imassa apavādasuttassa visayepi.
anya-e0806n3:230_1: vivaraṇamiccāha-‘vijjāyoni’ccādi, vijjā ca yoni ca vijjā yonī tāsaṁ sambandho, so
anya-e0806n3:230_2: yesaṁ atthi te hotādayo mātādayo ca abhedopacāreneha vijjāyonisambandhisaddena gayhantīti
anya-e0806n3:230_3: adhippāyo, tasaddenāti tatretyatra. Te ca ltupitādayoti tasaddena parāmaṭṭhā ltupitādayo
anya-e0806n3:230_4: ca, atthe kāriyā sambhavā taṁvācako saddo gayhati.
anya-e0806n3:236_0: Itthisaddena itthiliṅgaṁ gahitaṁ na itthī, taggahaṇe sati ‘itthiyaṁ vattamāne’ti
anya-e0806n3:236_1: vuttiganthassa itthisaṅkhāte atthe vattamāneti attho gayheyya, evaṁ sati ‘kalyāṇippadhānā’ti
anya-e0806n3:236_2: etthāpi pumbhāvo pasajjeyya… padhānasaddassa kalyāṇiyaṁ vattamānattāti āha- ‘itthiyanti
anya-e0806n3:236_3: itthiliṅge’ti. Atha itthiyanti ettake vutte kathaṁ taggahaṇaṁ siyāti āha-‘visesane’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:236_4: ekattheti vuttepi itthiyaṁ vattamāneti ayamattho viññāyatīti itthiyanti vacanamanatthaṁ
anya-e0806n3:236_6: āha- ‘visesane’ccādi, itthiyanti itthiliṅgasseva gahaṇanti sambandho. Byavacchejjābhāvā
anya-e0806n3:236_7: visesanamanatthakaṁ siyāti ekattheiccaneneva itthiyaṁ vuttiyā (gamma) bhāvatoti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n3:236_8: Pume pulliṅge vattamāno saddo pumāsaddo, sakaloti padesasakalo hi gayhati… kassaci
anya-e0806n3:238_0: Vattanaṁ ekasmiṁ atthe adhitthiccādo itthivisiṭṭhe sattamiyatthādo, vāsiṭṭhoccādo
anya-e0806n3:238_1: vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādo, puttīyaticcādo puttādivisiṭṭhe icchādyatthe pavatti,
anya-e0806n3:238_2: tenāha-‘ekatthībhāvo’ti. Sāmañña gahaṇatthanti iminā mattasaddassa kasiṇatthe pavattimāha.
anya-e0806n3:240_0: Evanti iminā itarītarayoge catthasamāsaṁ vibhāveti. Jānijāyā, saddantarenāti jānisaddena
anya-e0806n3:240_1: tathāsaddopadiṭṭhena daṁ jaṁ saddantarena ca, kesañciti kharīgatantiādīsu ‘kharī’tiādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n3:240_2: kesañci, kharīti kharatthe vattamāno-yaṁ saddo niyatavisayo… gatasaddaṁ vinā aññattha
anya-e0806n3:240_3: adiṭṭhattā, nāyampayogoti tudampatippayogaṁ nivattetvā hetumāha- ‘āgame’ccādi, aññehi
anya-e0806n3:242_0: Nanu sutte‘sare’ti ettakaṁ vuttaṁ‘sarādo’ti kathaṁ laddhanti āha-‘sare’tiādi, vaṇṇe
anya-e0806n3:242_1: yantantadādoti siṭṭhavacanaṁ, vaṇṇe parabhūte yaṁ kāriyaṁ vidhīyate taṁ so vaṇṇo
anya-e0806n3:242_2: ādi yassa taṁ tadādi, tasmiṁ tadādo uttarapade sampajjatīti attho, khādhātuto ktappaccaye
anya-e0806n3:242_3: vihite rassenākārenevāyampayogo, na visuṁ akārenāti dassetuṁ na ākkhātaṁ anakkhāta
anya-e0806n3:244_1: sabbesameva saddānaṁ nipphannavācitañcāttano dīpeti, yathākathañci nipphatti, ruḷhiyā
anya-e0806n3:244_2: atthanicchayo, tena saññeccādo-dhippāyaṁ vivarati ‘yaṁkiñci’tyādinā, itthī ca pumā
anya-e0806n3:244_3: ca itthipumaṁ, na itthi pumanti samāse nipātaneniminā napuṁsakādeso napuṁsakaniddeso
anya-e0806n3:244_4: (potthake) ti dasseti ‘na itthi’ccādinā. Khī-khaye, khara-vināse cāti hi etehi ‘na
anya-e0806n3:244_5: khīyati na kharatī’ti atthe “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccaye’ na khaya
anya-e0806n3:244_6: na khara’iti ṭhite khattādesoti āha- na khīyati’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:246: Evanti iminā gacchatīti vākye kvippaccayādiṁ dasseti, viseso panettha nañssa(ṭo) vasalo caṇḍālo, sītena karaṇabhūtena.
anya-e0806n3:248: Tattha tasmiṁ parabhūte, yassa ca jhattanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:250_2: Kapotādibhāveti katthaci gharādo kapotavātamaṇḍalikādīnaṁ dassanavasena sabbhāve
anya-e0806n3:250_3: sati. Agyādidassanatoti aggipisācādidassanato, aññatrāpīti gharādito aññatra, kapotavātamaṇḍalikādino
anya-e0806n3:250_4: liṅgassa, agyādiyoganti aggiādīhi anumeyyehi sambandhaṁ. Mantvāti anumānañāṇena jānitvāpayogoti
anya-e0806n3:252_0: Sakatthe vattamānassa sahasaddassāti vattabbe vattamāno tappadhānoyevāti āha- ‘sakatthappadhānassa
anya-e0806n3:252_1: sahasaddassā’ti, vutti bhavatīti sambandho, yugapadi dhurā sadhuraṁ. Aparaṇhena sahitaṁ sahā paraṇhaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:254_0: “Aṭṭhādasa nimesā tu, kaṭṭhā tiṁsantu tākalā”ti vacanato āha- ‘kalā kālaviseso’ti.
anya-e0806n3:254_3: akālattho”ti. Ganthavuttipi kalādi kālasaddatthaṁ nātikkamatīti adhippāyenāha- ‘ganthavuttipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:254_4: Adhiko māsako assāti samāsako, vikappena siddheti “sahassa so-ññatthe”ti (3-78).
anya-e0806n3:256_0: Samāno pati yassā sapattinī sapattī iti nipphannānamekadeso ‘pattinī pattī’ti dassitoti
anya-e0806n3:256_2: gaṇapāṭhato akkhaye vattamānasso manādittā okārantattanti dassetumāha- ‘vayo’tiādi.
anya-e0806n3:260: Tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī amhādīccādiṁ “sabbādīnamā”ti (3-86) ā.
anya-e0806n3:262: Gabbhenāti iminā kucchigatena gabbhena saha dvihadayattamassāti dasseti, pubbapadeti dusadde.
anya-e0806n3:264: Guṇā paṭalā dve padāni assa iti bhavitabbaṁ dve pādā esaṁ dve satāni assa, dve sahassāni assa, dvinnaṁ satānaṁ dvinnaṁ sahassānaṁ vā samāhāroti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:266: Dvattipattāti paṭhamantā‘pūra-pūraṇe’iccasmā karaṇatthe “bhāva kārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccaye syādisamāsoti dassetu māha- ‘dvattipatta’iccādi.
anya-e0806n3:268: Dve ca tiṁsā ca, dvīhi vā adhikā tiṁsāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:270_0: Sampattavibhāsāyanti ayaṁyogo (sampattavibhāsāti) dasseti, sampatte vibhāsā vikappoti
anya-e0806n3:270_1: attho, tayo ca cattālīsā ca, tīhi vā adhikā cattālīsāccādinā viggaho, tisso cattālīsā
